1→# File Upload User Stories - Post Start Upload
     2→
     3→This document outlines user stories describing what happens from a user perspective after completing the deduplication and upload queue process and clicking the "Start Upload" button.
     4→
     5→## User Stories
     6→
     7→### 1. Upload Progress Visibility
     8→**As a user**, when I click "Start Upload", **I want** to see immediate visual feedback that the upload process has begun, **so that** I know my action was registered and the system is working.
     9→
    10→### 2. Real-Time Upload Progress
    11→**As a user**, **I want** to see a progress bar or percentage showing how many files have been uploaded versus the total, **so that** I can estimate how long the remaining upload will take.
    12→
    13→### 3. Individual File Upload Status
    14→**As a user**, **I want** to see the status of individual files (uploading, completed, failed) in the queue, **so that** I can identify any problematic files that need attention.
    15→
    16→### 4. Upload Speed Information
    17→**As a user**, **I want** to see the current upload speed (MB/s or files/min), **so that** I can understand if my connection is performing well and estimate completion time.
    18→
    19→### 5. Pause and Resume Capability
    20→**As a user**, **I want** to be able to pause the upload process if needed, **so that** I can manage my bandwidth or stop the process without losing progress.
    21→
    22→### 7. Error Handling and Recovery
    23→**As a user**, when a file fails to upload, **I want** to see clear error messages and have options to retry, **so that** I can resolve issues without restarting the entire process.
    24→
    25→### 8. Duplicate File Handling
    26→**As a user**, when the system encounters files that already exist in storage, **I want** to identify and log differences in file names, folder path, and meta data for files with identical SHA256 hash values **so that** all metadata information is preserved.
    27→
    28→### 9. Interruption Recovery
    29→**As a user**, if my upload is interrupted during upload, **I want** the system to pickup from where we left off **so that** we don't repeat the same work.
    30→
    31→### 9. Thurough and reliable bulk uploading
    32→**As a user**, if a file upload starts, **I want** the database to track whether the upload completed successfully **so that** we can ensure that all files are uploaded.
    33→
    34→### 10. Upload Completion Notification
    35→**As a user**, when all files have been successfully uploaded, **I want** to receive a clear completion message with a summary of results, **so that** I know the process finished and can see what was accomplished.
    36→
    37→### 11. Failed Upload Summary
    38→**As a user**, after the upload process completes, **I want** to see a summary of any failed uploads with reasons, **so that** I can address issues and retry if needed.
    39→
    40→### 14. Batch Upload Cancellation
    41→**As a user**, **I want** the ability to cancel the entire upload process if needed, **so that** I can stop unwanted uploads without waiting for completion.
    42→
    43→### 15. Post-Upload Detailed Review
    44→**As a user**, after uploading completes, **I want** the ability to review the upload results file by file, **so that** I can see details of the upload results..
    45→
    46→### 18. Cleanup and Reset
    47→**As a user**, after uploading completes, **I want** the ability to control clearing of the upload the upload queue, **so that** I can begin a new upload session without confusion from previous data.

file.content:
# File Upload User Stories - Post Start Upload

This document outlines user stories describing what happens from a user perspective after completing the deduplication and upload queue process and clicking the "Start Upload" button.

## User Stories

### 1. Upload Progress Visibility
**As a user**, when I click "Start Upload", **I want** to see immediate visual feedback that the upload process has begun, **so that** I know my action was registered and the system is working.

### 2. Real-Time Upload Progress
**As a user**, **I want** to see a progress bar or percentage showing how many files have been uploaded versus the total, **so that** I can estimate how long the remaining upload will take.

### 3. Individual File Upload Status
**As a user**, **I want** to see the status of individual files (uploading, completed, failed) in the queue, **so that** I can identify any problematic files that need attention.

### 4. Upload Speed Information
**As a user**, **I want** to see the current upload speed (MB/s or files/min), **so that** I can understand if my connection is performing well and estimate completion time.

### 5. Pause and Resume Capability
**As a user**, **I want** to be able to pause the upload process if needed, **so that** I can manage my bandwidth or stop the process without losing progress.

### 7. Error Handling and Recovery
**As a user**, when a file fails to upload, **I want** to see clear error messages and have options to retry, **so that** I can resolve issues without restarting the entire process.

### 8. Duplicate File Handling
**As a user**, when the system encounters files that already exist in storage, **I want** to identify and log differences in file names, folder path, and meta data for files with identical SHA256 hash values **so that** all metadata information is preserved.

### 9. Interruption Recovery
**As a user**, if my upload is interrupted during upload, **I want** the system to pickup from where we left off **so that** we don't repeat the same work.

### 9. Thurough and reliable bulk uploading
**As a user**, if a file upload starts, **I want** the database to track whether the upload completed successfully **so that** we can ensure that all files are uploaded.

### 10. Upload Completion Notification
**As a user**, when all files have been successfully uploaded, **I want** to receive a clear completion message with a summary of results, **so that** I know the process finished and can see what was accomplished.

### 11. Failed Upload Summary
**As a user**, after the upload process completes, **I want** to see a summary of any failed uploads with reasons, **so that** I can address issues and retry if needed.

### 14. Batch Upload Cancellation
**As a user**, **I want** the ability to cancel the entire upload process if needed, **so that** I can stop unwanted uploads without waiting for completion.

### 15. Post-Upload Detailed Review
**As a user**, after uploading completes, **I want** the ability to review the upload results file by file, **so that** I can see details of the upload results..

### 18. Cleanup and Reset
**As a user**, after uploading completes, **I want** the ability to control clearing of the upload the upload queue, **so that** I can begin a new upload session without confusion from previous data.

content.text: I can see the numbering issues in the FileUploadStories.md file. The stories are numbered 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 9 (duplicate), 10, 11, 14, 15, 18. I need to renumber them sequentially from 1-12.

2. Replaced "### 8. Duplicate File Handling" with "### 7. Duplicate File Handling"

4. Replaced "### 9. Thurough and reliable bulk uploading" with "### 9. Thorough and reliable bulk uploading"
5. Replaced "### 14. Batch Upload Cancellation" with "### 12. Batch Upload Cancellation"
6. Replaced "### 15. Post-Upload Detailed Review" with "### 13. Post-Upload Detailed Review"
7. Replaced "### 18. Cleanup and Reset" with "### 14. Cleanup and Reset"

toolUseResult.originalFileContents:
# File Upload User Stories - Post Start Upload

This document outlines user stories describing what happens from a user perspective after completing the deduplication and upload queue process and clicking the "Start Upload" button.

## User Stories

### 1. Upload Progress Visibility
**As a user**, when I click "Start Upload", **I want** to see immediate visual feedback that the upload process has begun, **so that** I know my action was registered and the system is working.

### 2. Real-Time Upload Progress
**As a user**, **I want** to see a progress bar or percentage showing how many files have been uploaded versus the total, **so that** I can estimate how long the remaining upload will take.

### 3. Individual File Upload Status
**As a user**, **I want** to see the status of individual files (uploading, completed, failed) in the queue, **so that** I can identify any problematic files that need attention.

### 4. Upload Speed Information
**As a user**, **I want** to see the current upload speed (MB/s or files/min), **so that** I can understand if my connection is performing well and estimate completion time.

### 5. Pause and Resume Capability
**As a user**, **I want** to be able to pause the upload process if needed, **so that** I can manage my bandwidth or stop the process without losing progress.

### 7. Error Handling and Recovery
**As a user**, when a file fails to upload, **I want** to see clear error messages and have options to retry, **so that** I can resolve issues without restarting the entire process.

### 8. Duplicate File Handling
**As a user**, when the system encounters files that already exist in storage, **I want** to identify and log differences in file names, folder path, and meta data for files with identical SHA256 hash values **so that** all metadata information is preserved.

### 9. Interruption Recovery
**As a user**, if my upload is interrupted during upload, **I want** the system to pickup from where we left off **so that** we don't repeat the same work.

### 9. Thurough and reliable bulk uploading
**As a user**, if a file upload starts, **I want** the database to track whether the upload completed successfully **so that** we can ensure that all files are uploaded.

### 10. Upload Completion Notification
**As a user**, when all files have been successfully uploaded, **I want** to receive a clear completion message with a summary of results, **so that** I know the process finished and can see what was accomplished.

### 11. Failed Upload Summary
**As a user**, after the upload process completes, **I want** to see a summary of any failed uploads with reasons, **so that** I can address issues and retry if needed.

### 14. Batch Upload Cancellation
**As a user**, **I want** the ability to cancel the entire upload process if needed, **so that** I can stop unwanted uploads without waiting for completion.

### 15. Post-Upload Detailed Review
**As a user**, after uploading completes, **I want** the ability to review the upload results file by file, **so that** I can see details of the upload results..

### 18. Cleanup and Reset
**As a user**, after uploading completes, **I want** the ability to control clearing of the upload the upload queue, **so that** I can begin a new upload session without confusion from previous data.

content.text: The numbering sequence has been repaired. The user stories are now numbered sequentially from 1-14, fixing the gaps and duplicate numbering. I also corrected the typo "Thurough" to "Thorough" in story 9.
